title: Back to school sales 2021: deals on laptops, tablets, backpacks, iPads and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Back to school deals from Walmart, Amazon, Target, and more
article: Back to school sales are in full swing with incredible deals from all your favorite retailers, including Walmart, Best Buy, Target, Amazon, and more. To help you find all the top offers, we're rounding up all the best back to school sales for you below. Whether you're looking to snag a deal on a new laptop, tablet, or headphones or looking for bargains on backpacks, dorm-room furniture, and appliances - our back to school sales guide has it all. We also have back to school deals exclusively for students like Apple, for example, is currently handing out free AirPods for college students with an eligible Mac or iPad purchase, and Best Buy is offering up $300 off Windows laptops - most of which are perfect for college. Below, you'll find links to all the best back to school sales, followed by today's standout deals, including AirPods, Fire tablets, backpacks, and more. Make sure to bookmark this page, as we'll be continuously updating it with all the latest offers leading up to the new school year event.
See more bargains with our roundup of the best Labor Day sales and see more of the best cheap laptop deals and the best cheap tablets deals.
